action.content:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

responsibility

Related words are:

- blame
- obligation
- reliability

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!
CLUE: This concept involves being accountable for one's actions and often comes with a sense of duty or commitment. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
this concept involves being accountable for ones actions and often comes with a sense of duty or commitment guesses from the other player will start with guessend

You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: This concept involves being accountable for one's actions and often comes with a sense of duty or commitment. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

CLUE: This term is associated with the quality of being dependable and trustworthy, often linked to one's role or position in a social or professional context. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

this term is associated with the quality of being dependable and trustworthy often linked to ones role or position in a social or professional context guesses from the other player will start with guessend

CLUE: This term is associated with the quality of being dependable and trustworthy, often linked to one's role or position in a social or professional context. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
CLUE: This attribute refers to the adherence to moral and ethical principles, suggesting honesty and strong moral uprightness. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
this attribute refers to the adherence to moral and ethical principles suggesting honesty and strong moral uprightness guesses from the other player will start with guessend
CLUE: This attribute refers to the adherence to moral and ethical principles, suggesting honesty and strong moral uprightness. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
